course.title: History of the Religion of Ancient Israel
course.meeting_text: M., W., (F.), at 10, and a section episodically to be arranged.
course.description: The study of ancient Israelite religion and culture in comparative historical context. Topics examined include conceptions of divinity, prophecy, law, kingship, and cult. Through such topics the aim is to see how Israel related to other cultures of the ancient Near East and, thus, of what value the study of the other cultures has in understanding the character of Israelite religion itself.
course.notes: Offered jointly with the Divinity School as 1110.
